properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_TYPE = '소셜링' AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_TYPE = '소셜링' AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND NOTICE_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_TYPE = '소셜링' AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND S_PLACE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_TYPE = '소셜링' AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND S_DATE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_TYPE = '소셜링' AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND S_TYPE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT NOTICE_NUM , NOTICE_TITLE , USER_NAME , S_PLACE , S_DATE , S_TIME , S_TYPE , ROUTE , CHANGE_NAME , NOTICE_STATUS FROM NOTICE JOIN MEMBER_INFO USING(USER_ID) JOIN SOCIALING USING(NOTICE_NUM) JOIN TBL_FILE USING(NOTICE_NUM) WHERE NOTICE_TYPE = '소셜링' AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_NUM DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT NOTICE_NUM , NOTICE_TITLE , USER_NAME , S_PLACE , S_DATE , S_TIME , S_TYPE , ROUTE , CHANGE_NAME , NOTICE_STATUS FROM NOTICE JOIN MEMBER_INFO USING(USER_ID) JOIN SOCIALING USING(NOTICE_NUM) JOIN TBL_FILE USING(NOTICE_NUM) WHERE NOTICE_TYPE = '소셜링' AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND NOTICE_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY NOTICE_NUM DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT NOTICE_NUM , NOTICE_TITLE , USER_NAME , S_PLACE , S_DATE , S_TIME , S_TYPE , ROUTE , CHANGE_NAME , NOTICE_STATUS FROM NOTICE JOIN MEMBER_INFO USING(USER_ID) JOIN SOCIALING USING(NOTICE_NUM) JOIN TBL_FILE USING(NOTICE_NUM) WHERE NOTICE_TYPE = '소셜링' AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND S_PLACE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY NOTICE_NUM DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT NOTICE_NUM , NOTICE_TITLE , USER_NAME , S_PLACE , S_DATE , S_TIME , S_TYPE , ROUTE , CHANGE_NAME , NOTICE_STATUS FROM NOTICE JOIN MEMBER_INFO USING(USER_ID) JOIN SOCIALING USING(NOTICE_NUM) JOIN TBL_FILE USING(NOTICE_NUM) WHERE NOTICE_TYPE = '소셜링' AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND S_DATE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY NOTICE_NUM DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT NOTICE_NUM , NOTICE_TITLE , USER_NAME , S_PLACE , S_DATE , S_TIME , S_TYPE , ROUTE , CHANGE_NAME , NOTICE_STATUS FROM NOTICE JOIN MEMBER_INFO USING(USER_ID) JOIN SOCIALING USING(NOTICE_NUM) JOIN TBL_FILE USING(NOTICE_NUM) WHERE NOTICE_TYPE = '소셜링' AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND S_TYPE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY NOTICE_NUM DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT NOTICE_NUM , NOTICE_TITLE , USER_NAME , S_PLACE , S_DATE , S_TIME , S_TYPE , ROUTE , CHANGE_NAME , NOTICE_STATUS FROM NOTICE JOIN MEMBER_INFO USING(USER_ID) JOIN SOCIALING USING(NOTICE_NUM) JOIN TBL_FILE USING(NOTICE_NUM) WHERE NOTICE_TYPE = '소셜링' AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND NOTICE_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY NOTICE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT NOTICE_NUM , NOTICE_TITLE , USER_NAME , S_PLACE , S_DATE , S_TIME , S_TYPE , ROUTE , CHANGE_NAME , NOTICE_STATUS FROM NOTICE JOIN MEMBER_INFO USING(USER_ID) JOIN SOCIALING USING(NOTICE_NUM) JOIN TBL_FILE USING(NOTICE_NUM) WHERE NOTICE_TYPE = '소셜링' AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND NOTICE_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY NCOUNT DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT NOTICE_NUM , NOTICE_TITLE , S_PLACE , S_DATE , S_TIME , S_TYPE , ROUTE , CHANGE_NAME FROM NOTICE JOIN SOCIALING USING(NOTICE_NUM) JOIN TBL_FILE USING(NOTICE_NUM) WHERE NOTICE_TYPE = '소셜링' AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND S_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE AND SYSDATE+2 ORDER BY NOTICE_NUM DESC
UPDATE NOTICE SET NCOUNT = NCOUNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NUM = ?

SELECT NOTICE_NUM , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , USER_ID , USER_NAME , NCOUNT , S_PLACE , S_DATE , S_TIME , S_TYPE , MAX_MEMBER , MIN_MEMBER FROM NOTICE JOIN SOCIALING USING(NOTICE_NUM) JOIN MEMBER_INFO USING(USER_ID) WHERE NOTICE_TYPE = '소셜링' AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND NOTICE_NUM = ?

SELECT NOTICE_NUM , USER_ID , ROUTE , CHANGE_NAME FROM NOTICE JOIN MEMBER_INFO USING(USER_ID) JOIN PROFILE_FILE F USING(USER_ID) WHERE NOTICE_TYPE = '소셜링' AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND F.STATUS = 'Y' AND NOTICE_NUM = ?
SELECT NOTICE_NUM , USER_ID , INTRODUCTION FROM NOTICE JOIN MEMBER_INFO USING(USER_ID) JOIN PROFILE USING(USER_ID) WHERE NOTICE_TYPE = '소셜링' AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND NOTICE_NUM = ?
SELECT FILE_NUM , ROUTE , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_LEVEL FROM TBL_FILE WHERE NOTICE_NUM = ? AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY FILE_NUM
SELECT USER_ID , S_STATUS , USER_NAME FROM SOCIALING_MEMBER JOIN MEMBER_INFO USING(USER_ID) WHERE NOTICE_NUM = ?
SELECT USER_ID , USER_NAME , ROUTE , CHANGE_NAME FROM SOCIALING_MEMBER JOIN MEMBER_INFO USING(USER_ID) JOIN PROFILE_FILE F USING(USER_ID) WHERE F.STATUS = 'Y' AND NOTICE_NUM = ?
SELECT USER_ID , USER_NAME , INTRODUCTION FROM SOCIALING_MEMBER JOIN MEMBER_INFO USING(USER_ID) JOIN PROFILE USING(USER_ID) WHERE NOTICE_NUM = ?
INSERT INTO SOCIALING_MEMBER VALUES ( ? , ? , DEFAULT )
UPDATE SOCIALING_MEMBER SET S_STATUS = 'N' WHERE NOTICE_NUM = ? AND USER_ID = ?

INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NOTICE_NUM , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , NOTICE_DATE , NOTICE_STATUS , NOTICE_TYPE , USER_ID , MODIFY_DATE , NCOUNT ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICE_NUM.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , '소셜링' , ? , SYSDATE , DEFAULT )
INSERT INTO SOCIALING ( NOTICE_NUM , S_PLACE , S_DATE , S_TYPE , MAX_MEMBER , MIN_MEMBER , S_TIME ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICE_NUM.CURRVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO TBL_FILE ( FILE_NUM , NOTICE_NUM , ROUTE , ORIGIN_NAME , FILE_LEVEL , CHANGE_NAME , STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_FILE_NUM.NEXTVAL , SEQ_NOTICE_NUM.CURRVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , DEFAULT )
UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE = ? , NOTICE_CONTENT = ? WHERE NOTICE_NUM = ?
UPDATE SOCIALING SET S_DATE = ? , S_TIME = ? , S_TYPE = ? , S_PLACE = ? , MIN_MEMBER = ? , MAX_MEMBER = ? WHERE NOTICE_NUM = ?
UPDATE TBL_FILE SET ORIGIN_NAME = ? , CHANGE_NAME = ? WHERE CHANGE_NAME = ?
UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_STATUS = 'N' WHERE NOTICE_NUM = ?
UPDATE TBL_FILE SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE NOTICE_NUM = ?
INSERT INTO SOCIALING_LIKE ( USER_ID , LIKE_NUM ) VALUES ( ? , ? )
SELECT USER_ID , LIKE_NUM FROM SOCIALING_LIKE WHERE LIKE_NUM = ? AND USER_ID = ?
DELETE FROM SOCIALING_LIKE WHERE USER_ID = ? AND LIKE_NUM = ?
